name: Gelo AI Block
author: Gelo

sections.description:
Gelo AI Block

The AI tool that you will actually use. Following the “do only one thing, but do it well” philosophy, this plugin adds an AI block to the default WordPress editor.

Using this block, you can use generative AI to help you generate or modify content directly within your posts or pages. The seamless and WordPress-compatible way to incorporate AI capabilities into your website.

Gelo AI Block adds generative AI functionality to your WordPress. You can add an AI HTML block to any page or post using Gutenberg editor and generate content using a prompt based interface.

The plugin is free forever, however you need to purchase credit to use the AI engine (SaaS service).

All the complexity related to AI is hidden, the plugin simply connects to our own backend, which uses best commercially available generative AI services. The tedious work of keeping up with the latest AI models and APIs is done for you.

Features:
* Adds a standard Gutenberg block to your editor
* Very intuitive user interface that is actually usable
* Both initial content generation and improving previously generated text via prompting
* Prompt history
* Fully compatible with WordPress Gutenberg look & feel
* Basic and advanced AI models
* Easy setup
* Secure payment via Stripe

Credit Usage and Follow-Up

The plugin itself is free forever, but you need to purchase credit to use the AI engine.

Purchase credit directly from Gelo AI menu page.

One request to the AI engine costs around 1-2 cents using the basic model and 10-15 cents using the more advanced model. For most purposes, we recommend using the basic model, which is the default. You can activate the advanced model separately for each request.

We are not able to return unused credit! For just testing the service, we recommend purchasing the minimum credit of just 1 USD. You can purchase more credit at any time.

It is possible to share credit among multiple WordPress installations. You will be provided with a license key for this purpose.

The Gelo AI menu page displays your remaining credit in real time.

Links

  • Plugin homepage
  • Terms and Conditions for the SaaS service
  • Privacy statement for the SaaS service

Videos
sections.installation:
Install Gelo AI Block either via the WordPress.org plugin directory or by uploading the files to your server.

After activating Gelo AI Block, go to Gelo AI menu.

That’s it. You’re ready to go!
sections.faq:
Have any queries?

Please post your question on plugin support forum

AI Block for Gutenberg
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Rename admin CSS file to avoid possible conflicts with other Gelo AI plugins.

1.0.0

  • First version
sections.screenshots:
1. Gelo AI Block in block list

  2. Gelo AI Block explained

  3. Content preview

  4. Settings page, always showing remaining AI engine credit
sections.reviews:
A big help on content creation

By terolahtinen on February 2, 2024

I use this not only in content creation but also for improving existing content, for instance I write text and the prompt AI with "review the text and improve if not proper english'
